1: כָּרַ֥ע <sup>3766 </sup> <n>boweth down</n> בֵּל֙ <sup>1078 </sup> <n>Bel</n> קֹרֵ֣ס <sup>7164 </sup> <n>stoopeth</n> נְב֔וֹ <sup>5015 </sup> <n>Nebo</n> הָיוּ֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֔ם <sup>6091 </sup> <n>their idols</n> לַחַיָּ֖ה <sup>2416 </sup> <n>were upon the beasts</n> וְלַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <sup>929 </sup> <n>and upon the cattle</n> נְשֻׂאֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <sup>5385 </sup> <n>your carriages</n> עֲמוּס֔וֹת <sup>6006 </sup> <n>[were] heavy loaden</n> מַשָּׂ֖א <sup>4853 </sup> <n>[they are] a burden</n> לַעֲיֵפָֽה׃ <sup>5889 </sup> <n>to the weary</n>
2: קָרְס֤וּ <sup>7164 </sup> <n>They stoop</n> כָֽרְעוּ֙ <sup>3766 </sup> <n>they bow down</n> יַחְדָּ֔ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָכְל֖וּ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>they could</n> מַלֵּ֣ט <sup>4422 </sup> <n>not deliver</n> מַשָּׂ֑א <sup>4853 </sup> <n>the burden</n> וְנַפְשָׁ֖ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>but themselves</n> בַּשְּׁבִ֥י <sup>7628 </sup> <n>into captivity</n> הָלָֽכָה׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>are gone</n> ס
3: שִׁמְע֤וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hearken</n> אֵלַי֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto me O house</n> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>and all the remnant</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הַֽעֲמֻסִים֙ <sup>6006 </sup> <n>which are borne</n> מִנִּי־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> בֶ֔טֶן <sup>990 </sup> <n>[by me] from the belly</n> הַנְּשֻׂאִ֖ים <sup>5375 </sup> <n>which are carried</n> מִנִּי־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> רָֽחַם׃ <sup>7356 </sup> <n>from the womb</n>
4: וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>and even</n> זִקְנָה֙ <sup>2209 </sup> <n>And [even] to [your] old age</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> ה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>will be the same</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>and even</n> שֵיבָ֖ה <sup>7872 </sup> <n>I [am] he and [even] to hoar hairs</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶסְבֹּ֑ל <sup>5445 </sup> <n>will I carry</n> אֲנִ֤י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> עָשִׂ֙יתִי֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[you] I have made</n> וַאֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶשָּׂ֔א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and I will bear</n> וַאֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶסְבֹּ֖ל <sup>5445 </sup> <n>even I will carry</n> וַאֲמַלֵּֽט׃ <sup>4422 </sup> <n>and will deliver</n> ס
5: לְמִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>to whom</n> תְדַמְי֖וּנִי <sup>1819 </sup> <n>To whom will ye liken</n> וְתַשְׁו֑וּ <sup>7737 </sup> <n>me and make [me] equal</n> וְתַמְשִׁל֖וּנִי <sup>4911 </sup> <n>and compare</n> וְנִדְמֶֽה׃ <sup>1819 </sup> <n>me that we may be like</n>
6: הַזָּלִ֤ים <sup>2107 </sup> <n>They lavish</n> זָהָב֙ <sup>2091 </sup> <n>gold</n> מִכִּ֔יס <sup>3599 </sup> <n>out of the bag</n> וְכֶ֖סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>silver</n> בַּקָּנֶ֣ה <sup>7070 </sup> <n>in the balance</n> יִשְׁקֹ֑לוּ <sup>8254 </sup> <n>and weigh</n> יִשְׂכְּר֤וּ <sup>7936 </sup> <n>[and] hire</n> צוֹרֵף֙ <sup>6884 </sup> <n>a goldsmith</n> וְיַעֲשֵׂ֣הוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and he maketh</n> אֵ֔ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>it a god</n> יִסְגְּד֖וּ <sup>5456 </sup> <n>they fall down</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>indeed</n> יִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּֽוּ׃ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>yea they worship</n>
7: יִ֠שָּׂאֻהוּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>They bear</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> כָּתֵ֨ף <sup>3802 </sup> <n>him upon the shoulder</n> יִסְבְּלֻ֜הוּ <sup>5445 </sup> <n>they carry</n> וְיַנִּיחֻ֤הוּ <sup>3240 </sup> <n>him and set him in his place</n> תַחְתָּיו֙ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>place</n> וְיַֽעֲמֹ֔ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and he standeth</n> מִמְּקוֹמ֖וֹ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>from his place</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יָמִ֑ישׁ <sup>4185 </sup> <n>shall he not remove</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>Though</n> יִצְעַ֤ק <sup>6817 </sup> <n>yea [one] shall cry</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יַעֲנֶ֔ה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>unto him yet can he not answer</n> מִצָּרָת֖וֹ <sup>6869 </sup> <n>him out of his trouble</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יוֹשִׁיעֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>nor save</n> ס
8: זִכְרוּ־ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Remember</n> זֹ֖את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>yourselves</n> וְהִתְאֹשָׁ֑שׁוּ <sup>377 </sup> <n>this and shew yourselves men</n> הָשִׁ֥יבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>bring [it] again</n> פוֹשְׁעִ֖ים <sup>6586 </sup> <n>O ye transgressors</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> לֵֽב׃ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>to mind</n>
9: זִכְר֥וּ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Remember</n> רִאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <sup>7223 </sup> <n>the former things</n> מֵעוֹלָ֑ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>of old</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָנֹכִ֥י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> אֵל֙ <sup>410 </sup> <n>for I [am] God</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> ע֔וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>other</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>and [there is] none else [I am] God</n> וְאֶ֥פֶס <sup>657 </sup> <n>and [there is] none</n> כָּמֽוֹנִי׃ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>like</n>
10: מַגִּ֤יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>Declaring</n> מֵֽרֵאשִׁית֙ <sup>7225 </sup> <n>from the beginning</n> אַחֲרִ֔ית <sup>319 </sup> <n>the end</n> וּמִקֶּ֖דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>and from ancient times</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> נַעֲשׂ֑וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[the things] that are not [yet] done</n> אֹמֵר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> עֲצָתִ֣י <sup>6098 </sup> <n>My counsel</n> תָק֔וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall stand</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חֶפְצִ֖י <sup>2656 </sup> <n>all my pleasure</n> אֶעֱשֶֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and I will do</n>
11: קֹרֵ֤א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>Calling</n> מִמִּזְרָח֙ <sup>4217 </sup> <n>from the east</n> עַ֔יִט <sup>5861 </sup> <n>a ravenous bird</n> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>country</n> מֶרְחָ֖ק <sup>4801 </sup> <n>from a far</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the man</n> [עֲצָתֹו כ] (עֲצָתִ֑י <sup>6098 </sup> <n>advice</n> ק) אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>Truly</n> דִּבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>yea I have spoken</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>truly</n> אֲבִיאֶ֔נָּה <sup>935 </sup> <n>[it] I will also bring</n> יָצַ֖רְתִּי <sup>3335 </sup> <n>it to pass I have purposed</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>truly</n> אֶעֱשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[it] I will also do</n> ס
12: שִׁמְע֥וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hearken</n> אֵלַ֖י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אַבִּ֣ירֵי <sup>47 </sup> <n>strong</n> לֵ֑ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>care for</n> הָרְחוֹקִ֖ים <sup>7350 </sup> <n>that [are] far from</n> מִצְּדָקָֽה׃ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>righteousness</n>
13: קֵרַ֤בְתִּי <sup>7126 </sup> <n>I bring near</n> צִדְקָתִי֙ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>my righteousness</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> תִרְחָ֔ק <sup>7368 </sup> <n>it shall not be far off</n> וּתְשׁוּעָתִ֖י <sup>8668 </sup> <n>and my salvation</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> תְאַחֵ֑ר <sup>309 </sup> <n>shall not tarry</n> וְנָתַתִּ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and I will place</n> בְצִיּוֹן֙ <sup>6726 </sup> <n>in Zion</n> תְּשׁוּעָ֔ה <sup>8668 </sup> <n>salvation</n> לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>for Israel</n> תִּפְאַרְתִּֽי׃ <sup>8597 </sup> <n>my glory</n> ס
